params.admin: The address with administrative privileges over the new escrow.
params.client: The address of the client for whom the escrow is being created.
params.escrowType: The type of escrow to deploy, which determines the template used for cloning.
params.registry: The address of the registry containing escrow configurations.

returns._0: The address of the newly deployed escrow contract.

params.escrow: The address of the escrow contract to check.

returns._0: True if the address is an existing deployed escrow contract, false otherwise.

deployEscrow(uint8,address,address,addre.notice: Deploys a new escrow contract with specified parameters.

existingEscrow(address).notice: Checks if the given address is an escrow contract deployed by this factory.

documentation.text: @notice Thrown when an operation involves a zero address where a valid address is required.
@notice Thrown when an invalid escrow type is used in operations requiring a specific escrow type.

@notice Emitted when the registry address is updated in the factory.
 @param registry The new registry address.

@title Interface for the Escrow Factory
 @dev Interface defining the functionality for an escrow factory, responsible for deploying new escrow contracts.
